MAN.TITLE: angle

PARAM_INDENT.PARAM_ITEM:
DeltaX and DeltaY
M x N intensity images, resulting from convolution with gradient masks in two orthogonal directions

PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: Intensity image. Each pixel has the angle of the approximated gradient, in radians. Where DeltaX is zero, theta is taken as PI/2.

DESCRIPTION.P: The function angle obtains the gradient direction theta from images yielded from convolution with gradient masks in direction x and y (DeltaX and DeltaY, respectively).
